What We Do

Our Electrical Services

Comprehensive electrical solutions for residential and commercial properties

Repair & Replacement

Expert repairs and upgrades to keep your electrical systems running safely and efficiently.

  • Panel upgrades and replacements
  • Rewiring services
  • Circuit breaker repairs
  • Extension installations

Troubleshooting

Reliable electrical troubleshooting to identify and resolve issues quickly and effectively.

  • Diagnostic services
  • Power outage resolution
  • Circuit testing
  • Safety inspections

Installation Services

Professional installation of all electrical fixtures, systems, and equipment.

  • Light fixtures & ceiling fans
  • Electrical panels
  • Generators (Generac certified)
  • EV chargers
  • Landscape lighting
  • Wiring installations

About Us

Family-Owned & Trusted in DFW

Guerrero's Electric has been proudly serving the Dallas-Fort Worth area for over 15 years. As a family-owned and operated business, we understand the importance of quality workmanship and exceptional customer service.

Our team is fully licensed, insured, and committed to providing the highest level of electrical services for both residential and commercial properties. We take pride in our work and treat every project with the same care and attention we would give our own homes.
